alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 12:01AM CDT until April 11 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting Greene, Jackson and George Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Flood Stage. Water approaches homes in west Merrill. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 18.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to 22.5 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
